name: A Trail Of Breadcrumbs
description:
Help Hanzel and Gretel escape the clutches of their wicked parents. But who else could be lurking in the forest?

Controls :

Movement: AD

Climb obstacles: E

Drop breadcrumb: shift.

Lead programmer and designer - squizout

Lead designer and programmer - ChipmunkGames

Lead artist and designer - Imladris96

Created for Scream Jam 2020. v1.0.2.0 was uploaded during the jam to fix a critical bug.
